keyFacts: The account balance as of April 30, 2017, was $16,802,138.59.
Significant outgoing transfers included $3,000,000.00 to Silicon Valley Bank and $400,000.00 to Bella Klein.
An incoming transfer of $8,000,000.00 was made from Leon D. Black and Debra R. Black.
The document includes detailed transaction descriptions and amounts for various dates in April 2017.
There are mentions of service charges and interest payments, indicating active account management.
